Reviews.Title: BLACK NOT WHITE
Reviews.Author: CollegeHippiiSter
Reviews.Content: My seller was horrible: BUYER BEWAREI was put in an awkward position because I have activated the phone but I am encountering issues with it. The phone does not hold a battery charge and takes well over 8 hours for a full charging. It is black and the product listed is white and there are minor starches on the back on the phone, mostly where the apple logo is located, that lead me to believe the phone was used previously.

Reviews.Title: Be honest, seller!
Reviews.Author: Acc517
Reviews.Content: It says it's a new one before I bought. After I received it, it's totally different from the pictures posted on Amazon web site - no Apple box and accessories but there was a scratch paper with a telephone number on it. I called that number to make sure the phone is a new phone - I only concern about the battery, box and accessories are not big deal. The guy who answered my call told me it is a brand new phone, to save costs they tossed the box. Okay that's fine, understandable. So I took the phone to Sprint to have it activated but I was told that the phone is a refurbished one. Here's my point - I don't mind it's an used or refurbished phone as long as I knew it, but if you tell me it's a brand new one while selling me something different, that's cheating. Be honest for doing anything in your life!

Reviews.Title: iphone
Reviews.Author: whoz28
Reviews.Content: I would reccommend purchasing through this buyer. very reliable!!! i ordered my phone and it came a day later so impressed....it also came with all the basic accessories and how to activate the phone...very organized and reliable guy to purchase from...the phone was refurbished but came as if it is brand new with everything from apple. great product.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: victorious
Reviews.Content: Not only did i receive the phone with a dead battery but the charger sent with it did not charge the phone at all. Then when i went to activate the phone it was linked to another account therefor i could not activate this phone.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever!
Reviews.Author: A'ndra
Reviews.Content: I saved up for a very long time to make this purchase... I am a student and having a phone that can serve as my computer when I am out and about. The phone was in MINT condition and arrived 3 days after I ordered it. Great product and great service. This merchant is the real deal and takes good care of their customers!

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4S locked and not Iphone 4 unlocked
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: "I received Apple Iphone 4S 8gb locked and I bought it at Cell Phones & Accessories ' Unlocked Phones ' apple. I'm from Brazil and it was an order from a friend. The cellphone doesn't work here because it is blocked. I will go back to the United States in July. How do I undo the mistake and have the Iphone 4 unlocked I bought? "

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: amendrake11810
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone for my wife as a Christmas gift. She loved it and hasn't been able to put it down. It is really impressive in everything it can do. It makes me want to get one instead of an Android.

Reviews.Title: Awful!! Biggest disappointment
Reviews.Author: Michelleb
Reviews.Content: Words can't describe how unsatisfied I am. The product I order was an iPhone 4 the phone was stolen. I could not connect it with sprint. Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: Don't trust it!
Reviews.Author: Lori Gish
Reviews.Content: After buying this product it seemed to work fine for a couple of days then the screen went black and we had it looked at by an apple store, they stated that it was taken apart and put back together with moisture in it and is not good, and can't be fixed.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: annie shaver
Reviews.Content: Impressed with the timely delivery and the quality of the phone. It was in fantastic shape with no signs of wear at all. Highly recommend purchasing from this seller. I thought it fantastic that there were references for any troubleshooting problems, which definitely comes in handy.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Darlene M. Wilson
Reviews.Content: Phone came faster than expected and works great!  (My granddaughter is on it 24/7)  Charging plug broke right away but I didn't even tell the company because I still have the charger from my original phone that was stolen.

Reviews.Title: Ehhh
Reviews.Author: chase
Reviews.Content: Great phone, but id recommend the iPhone 4s or 5. SImply put, the 4 is quickly becoming outdated with all the new features that apple is introducing. If your tight on money, then this is forsure a good phone.

Reviews.Title: Happy!
Reviews.Author: Sheri L Mercurio
Reviews.Content: Ordered on Monday, got it on Wednesday. No problems with it when I activated it with Sprint! It is exactly how it was advertised. Very happy!!!

Reviews.Title: Love My iPhone
Reviews.Author: Idanys
Reviews.Content: My phone came fast. I receved it the following day after the purchase was comfirmed. It came looking new with no probelms at all. Everything that normally comes with it was in the package. (Charger and Earbuds) And a plus the seller sent me a few extra accerssories free of charge without even asking! He sent me a case and a screen protecter. I am a very satisfied customer. Im so in love with my new iPhone...

Reviews.Title: Just a warning ...
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: Make sure you thoroughly research who you are buying your product from. I had issues getting my iphone because of an error with the seller .... the first phone i was originally sent was in great condition, however it had a bad esn. the replacement phone i received was able to be activated but had a few chips on the back of it. phone works fine but my journey to receiving this phone was tough!

Reviews.Title: My iphone
Reviews.Author: BrianaT
Reviews.Content: I glad that the iphone was shipped very first, very please that the phone was in new condition, thank you for the case and screen protecters, but not happy that the phone was previously used. Other then that Im please so far.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the iphone 4 8gb white i love it everything runs very well, and soomth everything about the features i like ... :)

Reviews.Title: A little misleading
Reviews.Author: frequent.buyer
Reviews.Content: The Apple Ipone 8gb Sprint White came in a timely fashion. It works great and looks amazing. The only problem I had with buying this phone was the pictures shown online. Online it was shown with a case and headphones, neither of which arrived with it.

Reviews.Title: Iphone no working well
Reviews.Author: sederick reed
Reviews.Content: Since I've got it has black screened and the volume doesn't work I would like a refund on this item

Reviews.Title: Great !!!
Reviews.Author: Breed92
Reviews.Content: Lasted me 3 years , Thank you . At first I was skeptical about purchasing a phone online , but the phone was everything it was listed as.

Reviews.Title: Apple Iphone 4 8gb Sprint White
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: This is a great little phone. I never had a problem with it. If somebody needs to have a nice and cheap cell phone, this is a great alternative.

Reviews.Title: Cautionary Tale
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: First of all the Iphone receive was in great condition. Rival most brand new ones. Clean product. Unfortunately the phone has BAD ESN marked at stolen/lost by Sprint. Current unable to activate.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Kristina
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome phone, and was way cheaper than it would have been if I'd have ordered from Sprint like I was going to. So far the phone is working wonderfully, and I hope it stays that way for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: JakJan12
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas. He is in love with it, it's great for a first iPhone user.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Oscar Langain
Reviews.Content: ok excelente producto. Muy buenas condiciones. Debería traer audífonos, manual de uso y una caja de protección. Aunque sea un producto usado.

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4
Reviews.Author: melissa ocasio
Reviews.Content: This phone looked like new.  It works perfect and the seller shipped it quickly.  I love my new iphone and the insurance it came with.

Reviews.Title: YEAH I LOVE MY PHONE
Reviews.Author: Caty Cabernoch
Reviews.Content: it was perfect great stupendous, than my dog spilled beer on it now it doesnt do the side turn/tilt ANYMORE

Reviews.Title: IPHONE 4
Reviews.Author: Sevy
Reviews.Content: I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PHONE AND ITS REALLY FAST, THE ONLY THING I WISH IT WOULD'VE HAD IS A MEMORY CARD SO I WOULDN'T HAVE TO PURCHASE MUSIC EVERYTIME I WANT A NEW ONE, LOL, BUT ITS WORTH HAVING!

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: JMHetrick
Reviews.Content: Not much to say...the phone was extactly what I thought it would be. Quick shipping...everything was how it should have been!

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: AngieJ48
Reviews.Content: My iphone came like BRAND NEW! I love it couldnt be happier! Really happy that i bought this!Ive been wanting an iphone for the longest and i couldnt be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: K Blaine
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier! My phone was exactly how it was described, brand new and in the box.  If you're looking for the best seller look no further! I loved that I got a confirmation email to make sure I knew what I was buying.  My phone was shipped the same day I purchased it and arrived on the first day that it said it would.  I was even provided with screen protectors and a rubber case and an offer to help me activate it. I can't say enough great things I was just really pleased.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone order
Reviews.Author: Steph
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with my order. Is exactly what I wanted and at a great price! Excellent contact and service, answers questions quickly. Will definitely be ordering from Alex again!

Reviews.Title: Product was not "brand new in box" as stated
Reviews.Author: DM
Reviews.Content: The seller was not truthful about the item being "brand new in box".  This was the only reason I bought from the seller in the first place.  The item did arrive promptly on date estimated, however, the iphone was in a ziplock bag and the charger and headphones were in a separate ziploc bag.  I instantly felt disappointed and duped because I no longer believed it was brand new.  At least the iphone was not scratched and appeared in good condition.  When we turned it on it seemed to have some charge still (unlike a brand new item) and it seemed to work.  We are keeping our fingers crossed that there is nothing wrong with it.  I will not be buying from ATechStore again due to false advertisement. I now noticed that there was a different reviewer that had a problem with their purchased iphone from this same seller having a stored e-mail which made the iphone also seem not brand new.  Seems like that reviewer had the same suspicion that I have.

Reviews.Title: SUCH AN AMAZING DEAL AND BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: psterling555
Reviews.Content: As you all know buying iphones online is always very risky. Considering so many of sellers will scam you or sell you a stolen phone ripping you off. Just recently bought my iphone 4 from Rahul Shah and it was as good as new! Easy set up at sprint, the phone looked like someone just opened the box. I would most def recommend buying anything from this buyer! 100% satisfaction guarenteed!!! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: LOVE this phone!!!!!
Reviews.Author: MDL811
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone 4 days ago. I love it so far. It is so easy to use. I now know why people love their iphones.Great phone.

Reviews.Title: i love it!
Reviews.Author: allie22869
Reviews.Content: it came just the way i was expecting it too, had no issues turning it on at the sprint store

Reviews.Title: Always Impressive
Reviews.Author: GRIFF "-Griffinstein"
Reviews.Content: I bought the iphone 4 phone for my wife after buying myself a 4S, and I have to say that I am thoroughly impressed with the phone.In a prevoius life I was an avid Android and Windows phone user since it was easier to access my files via USB; But what was kind of crazy was that I went through 3 seperate phones over the course of a 2 year period, Evo 4G, a touch pro 2 (windows), and another which I don't remember the name since I didn't have it that long. All of which showed significant depreciation of usuability after just a few months of use i.e. Battery Life and Operaability.  By operability I mean, some had over-heating issues with playing games, general lag in loading times, depreciated service reception, and laggy less responsive touch screen displays.So I tried out the Iphone through much resistance, and have had the phone for about 6 months now and still love it.  The quality of the phone far surpases all of the android phones I have owned, the thick glass is fairly scratch resistant, unlike the HTC phones with softer screens easily prone to scratches just by whipping with a micro-fiber cloth.This phone has yet to do anything but run aps I download very smoothly (including games), I never have any latency in the touch screen, and my service is always amazing (Sprint).  The battery life of the phone is nothing short of amazing, especially given the fact that I am CONSTANTLY on my phone fiddling around, I have no issues with the battery not lasting all day before a recharge generally more than 12 hours at work.Obviously if you are prone to dropping your phone you will NEED a case, and I usually go with screen protectors as well just to increase the lifespan.In conclusion, if you can adapt to iTunes, and learning the new iOS, you will think this phone is nothing short of amazing and you will be begging for the new iPhone 5 when it comes out.

Reviews.Title: I am sad
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: I don't know what to do beacause I can't find a sim slot on this phone,does it work with calling card ?

Reviews.Title: Awesome price!
Reviews.Author: Lockleg
Reviews.Content: Came as promised. Perfectly new and we are VERY pleased. My wife loves her new phone that I had got her for Christmas, she uses it every day and is very happy with it enough said!

Reviews.Title: I wonder if the phone is unlocked
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I wonder if the phone is unlocked and is GSM warranty? I'm interested in, from Venezuela ... I hope your answer thanks

Reviews.Title: irritated customer
Reviews.Author: meezie
Reviews.Content: i have been ready everyones reviews about how quickly their phone was sent out but in my case it has been 8 days since i ordered the phone and it is STILL not here... It even took a few days for the tracking information to show up after it said it had been shipped... I am in desperate need of a new iphone since my last one was stolen and having to wait this long for another one just sucks..i hope i have no disappointments when the phone gets here even tho it doesnt even come with headphones or any accessories like one of the other reviews i read....overall im just so annoyed and want my phone so i dont have to deal with this waiting and wondering if the phone is going to be what i expect.....:'(
